mapper.select: SELECT N.NOTICE_NO , N.MEMBER_NO , M.NAME , N.TITLE , N.CLICK_NO , N.FILE_PATH , N.CATEGORY , N.EMERGENCY_YN , N.OPEN_DEPART , N.ENROLL_DATE FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON N.MEMBER_NO = M.NO WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC
SELECT NOTICE_NO , MEMBER_NO , TITLE , CONTENT , CLICK_NO , FILE_PATH , CATEGORY , EMERGENCY_YN , OPEN_DEPART , ENROLL_DATE , UPDATE_DATE FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET CLICK_NO = CLICK_NO+1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
